Description-Content-Type: UNKNOWN
Description: Django REST Framework History
        =============================
        
        |build-status-image| |pypi-version|
        
        Add Django admin style history to your Django REST Framework REST API
        
        Overview
        --------
        
        **Django REST Framework History** provides basic Django admin style
        history outside of the Django admin.
        
        Features
        ~~~~~~~~
        
        -  Simple ``ModelSerializer`` and ``ModelViewSet`` integration
        -  Overrides ``create`` and ``update`` to add ``LogEntry`` objects for
           the corresponding models
        -  Adds a ``/history`` ``detail_route`` to a resource. **Ex:**
           ``/entries/:id/history``
        
        Disclaimer
        ----------
        
        Though the ideas below are very interesting, this project makes no
        claims to attempt them at all. But that’s not to say this project won’t
        attempt to implement them in the future.
        
        -  `**Event
           Sourcing** <https://martinfowler.com/eaaDev/EventSourcing.html>`__
        -  `Provide rich model history like **Django
           Reversion** <https://github.com/etianen/django-reversion>`__
        
        Usage
        -----
        
        TBD
        
        Requirements
        ------------
        
        -  Python 3.5+
        -  Django (1.8, 1.9, 1.10, 1.11)
        -  Django REST Framework (3.1, 3.2, 3.3, 3.4, 3.5, 3.6)
        
        Installation
        ------------
        
        TBD
        
        .. |build-status-image| image:: https://secure.travis-ci.org/encode/django-rest-framework-history.svg?branch=master
           :target: http://travis-ci.org/encode/django-rest-framework-history?branch=master
        .. |pypi-version| image:: https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/djangorestframework-history.svg
           :target: https://pypi.python.org/pypi/djangorestframework-history
        
Keywords: django rest api djangorestframework history
